featured.text: Bobby cared a lot about his _____ at home and asked his parents not to go through his things without his permission.
The Hebrew Bible states that Nehemiah, an official serving King Artaxerxes of ancient Persia, asked permission to travel to Judah.

definition.zh_def: 允許或同意的權利或狀態。
definition.en_def: The right or state of being allowed to do something.
definition.example: You need to get permission from your teacher before leaving the classroom.
